SPEED/ CONSUMPTION:
AT SEA
BALLAST: ABT 13KTS / ABT 20.5MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)
LADEN: ABT 13KTS / ABT 22.0MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)
ALL DETAILS ARE ABOUT AND ABOUT IS DEFINED AS -0.5 KNOT ON THE SPEED AND +5% ON THE CONSUMPTION FIGURES.
ECO SPEED / CONSUMPTION: WOG
BALLAST: ABT 12KTS / ABT 19.5MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)
LADEN: ABT 12KTS / ABT 20.5MT LSFO + ABT 0.1MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER/INCINERATOR USE)
(ABOVE ECO IS ALWAYS SUBJECT TO VESSEL PERIODICALLY DURING SHORT INTERVALS, OF ABOUT
2-3 HOURS EVERY 2 DAYS OR AS REQUIRED, INCREASE RPM IN ORDER TO MAINTAIN THE SMOOTH RUNNING OF THE MAIN ENGINE)
IN PORT
IDLE: ABT LSFO 2.0 MT + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER USE)
WORKING: ABT LSFO 4.0 MT + ABT 0.1 MT LSMGO (FOR BOILER USE)
GRABS WORKING: ABT ADDITIONAL LSIFO 1.5 MT.
ADA
Thank you and awaiting yours for further development.
Best Regards
REGENCY SHIPPING PTE LTD
As Agents only
